title: Which one is better for hair, onion juice or onion oil? - Quora

response.answer_text: Onion juice and onion oil both are work for hair growth. But onion oil is good for hair regrowth because onion oil made with onion and other natural ingredients which are beneficial for your hairs. Newish Red Onion Oil is best oil for hair regrowth . It also helpful in reducing dandruff and hair-fall. This red onion oil has great source of sulphur and sulphur is essential for hair growth. It’s uses makes your hairs smoother, shiny and stronger in comparison of before using onion oil. It stimulates & nourishes hairs. This oil is organic oil which does not contain any harsh chemical which harm your hairs.

Onion juice is freshly prepared. No doubt you have to make it and then apply. Since the hair becomes sticky you are required to wash off after certain time. Onion oil is available in the market and very convenient. Just take few drops mix with coconut oil and apply. You can leave it overnight also. Depending on your choice and preferences you have to choose the one. Both are for improving the hair health
